CustomField.formula: IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > 1, 'Critical', IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > (1060/1440), 'Delay 16-24h', IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > (480/1440), 'Delay 8-16h', IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > (240/1440), 'Delay 4-8h', IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > (120/1440), 'Delay 2-4h', IF((NOW() - fboost__NextExecutionTime__c) > (60/1440), 'Delay 1-2h', 'OK'))))))
CustomField.label: Status
